name: Quest For The Power Part 1 FantasyOnyx
name_original: Quest For The Power Part 1 FantasyOnyx
description: If you ever played in Fall and Rise of Shimon and had a fight with J.S's super aka C.S, do you ever questioned where he did get this super power? Well, this game will tell a little mediocre story about how dummy hero has earned their own super form, in his journey J.S will meet need to find the legendary artifact, FantasyOnyx which will be his own "Chaos Emerald", but the journey is this will not be east, because Just Simon had to literally overcame the manifestations of his anxiety and defeat the protagonists of different games with their own super forms, help to J.S become C.S.
